definitions.definition: To whine ; to complain , especially in an annoying or persistent manner.
examples: Argh! He has been whinging about it all night, even though he knows there's nothing we can do.
I know it won't help but sometimes it feels better to whinge about the things that annoy me.

main_definition: ( UK , Commonwealth , Ireland ) To whine ; to complain , especially in an annoying or persistent manner.
